briefDescription: An online bazar platform where vendors can sell fresh products, users can browse and purchase securely, and admins manage approvals and analytics.
challengesFaced: Integrating Stripe payment gateway with Firebase authentication.
Handling role-based access control for vendors, users, and admins.
Optimizing large datasets for product filtering and search.

briefDescription: A modern bookshelf app allowing users to track, review, and manage their personal book collections with detailed analytics.
challengesFaced: Synchronizing real-time data updates between client and server.
Managing authentication state across different protected routes.
Creating responsive charts that adapt to various screen sizes.
potentialImprovementsAndFuturePlans: Add social sharing and community book clubs.
Implement offline mode with service workers.
Integrate with third-party book APIs for richer metadata.

briefDescription: A modern platform that allows clients to search, compare, and book lawyers based on expertise and location. The system features analytics for law firms, client booking history, and an easy-to-navigate interface for both clients and lawyers.
challengesFaced: Implementing advanced filtering and search to match clients with the most relevant lawyers.
Designing a secure booking system to prevent double scheduling.
Integrating analytics dashboards using Recharts for both clients and lawyers.
potentialImprovementsAndFuturePlans: Add secure online payment and invoicing for legal services.
Introduce real-time availability and calendar sync for lawyers.
Implement in-app messaging and document sharing between clients and lawyers.
